reference.title: Chunk topics (chunk)
reference.shortdesc: The chunk step is a Java module that breaks apart and assembles referenced DITA content based on the chunk attribute in maps.

section.p:
The following values are recognized on the chunk attribute, based on definitions provided in the DITA specification. These values were initially defined in the DITA 1.1 specification, with significant clarifications in the DITA 1.2 specification.
select-topic
select-document
select-branch
by-topic
by-document
to-content
to-navigation.
